mapper.select: SELECT ROWNUM, BOARD_NO,BC.B_CATEGORY_NAME,BOARD_TITLE FROM BOARD B JOIN BCATEGORY BC ON (B.B_CATEGORY_NO = BC.B_CATEGORY_NO) WHERE BOARD_STATUS = 'Y' AND B.B_CATEGORY_NO != 'BC00001' AND ROWNUM < 11 ORDER BY BOARD_VCOUNT DESC

SELECT ROWNUM, G.GROOMING_NO, G.GROOMING_TITLE, G.GROOMING_INTRODUCE, G.GROOMING_IMG, G.GROOMING_TYPE , GD.D_DAY, GT.TAG_NAME, G.GROOMING_PARTICIPANTS, GC.GMEMBER_COUNT , G.GROOMING_COUNT FROM GROOMING G JOIN (SELECT GROOMING_NO, TRUNC(GROOMING_END_DATE - SYSDATE) AS D_DAY FROM GROOMING) GD ON(G.GROOMING_NO = GD.GROOMING_NO) LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT GROOMING_NO, (LISTAGG(TAG_NAME,',') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY GROOMING_NO)) AS TAG_NAME FROM GTAG GT JOIN TAG TA ON(GT.TAG_NO = TA.TAG_NO) GROUP BY GROOMING_NO) GT ON(G.GROOMING_NO = GT.GROOMING_NO) LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT GROOMING_NO, COUNT(MEMBER_NO) AS GMEMBER_COUNT FROM GROMMING_MEMBER GROUP BY GROOMING_NO) GC ON(G.GROOMING_NO = GC.GROOMING_NO) WHERE G.GROOMING_TYPE = '멘토' AND G.GROOMING_STATUS = 'Y' AND GD.D_DAY >= 0 AND ROWNUM < 5

SELECT ROWNUM, G.GROOMING_NO, G.GROOMING_TITLE, G.GROOMING_INTRODUCE, G.GROOMING_IMG, G.GROOMING_TYPE , GD.D_DAY, GT.TAG_NAME, G.GROOMING_PARTICIPANTS, GC.GMEMBER_COUNT , G.GROOMING_COUNT FROM GROOMING G JOIN (SELECT GROOMING_NO, TRUNC(GROOMING_END_DATE - SYSDATE) AS D_DAY FROM GROOMING) GD ON(G.GROOMING_NO = GD.GROOMING_NO) JOIN (SELECT GROOMING_NO, (LISTAGG(TAG_NAME,',') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY GROOMING_NO)) AS TAG_NAME FROM GTAG GT JOIN TAG TA ON(GT.TAG_NO = TA.TAG_NO) GROUP BY GROOMING_NO) GT ON(G.GROOMING_NO = GT.GROOMING_NO) LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT GROOMING_NO, COUNT(MEMBER_NO) AS GMEMBER_COUNT FROM GROMMING_MEMBER GROUP BY GROOMING_NO) GC ON(G.GROOMING_NO = GC.GROOMING_NO) WHERE G.GROOMING_STATUS = 'Y' AND GD.D_DAY >= 0 AND ROWNUM < 5 ORDER BY GROOMING_COUNT DESC

SELECT ROWNUM , ALLG.GROOMING_NO, ALLG.GROOMING_TITLE, ALLG.GROOMING_INTRODUCE, ALLG.GROOMING_IMG, ALLG.GROOMING_TYPE , ALLG.D_DAY, ALLG.TAG_NAME, ALLG.GROOMING_PARTICIPANTS, ALLG.GMEMBER_COUNT , ALLG.GROOMING_COUNT FROM ( SELECT G.GROOMING_NO, G.GROOMING_TITLE, G.GROOMING_INTRODUCE, G.GROOMING_IMG, G.GROOMING_TYPE , GD.D_DAY, GT.TAG_NAME, G.GROOMING_PARTICIPANTS, GC.GMEMBER_COUNT , G.GROOMING_COUNT FROM GROOMING G JOIN (SELECT GROOMING_NO, TRUNC(GROOMING_END_DATE - SYSDATE) AS D_DAY FROM GROOMING) GD ON(G.GROOMING_NO = GD.GROOMING_NO) JOIN (SELECT GROOMING_NO, (LISTAGG(TAG_NAME,',') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY GROOMING_NO)) AS TAG_NAME FROM GTAG GT JOIN TAG TA ON(GT.TAG_NO = TA.TAG_NO) GROUP BY GROOMING_NO) GT ON(G.GROOMING_NO = GT.GROOMING_NO) LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT GROOMING_NO, COUNT(MEMBER_NO) AS GMEMBER_COUNT FROM GROMMING_MEMBER GROUP BY GROOMING_NO) GC ON(G.GROOMING_NO = GC.GROOMING_NO) WHERE G.GROOMING_STATUS = 'Y' AND GD.D_DAY >= 0 ORDER BY GROOMING_END_DATE) ALLG WHERE ROWNUM < 5 ORDER BY ALLG.D_DAY

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM GROOMING G JOIN (SELECT GROOMING_NO, TRUNC(GROOMING_END_DATE - SYSDATE) AS D_DAY FROM GROOMING) GD ON(G.GROOMING_NO = GD.GROOMING_NO) WHERE G.GROOMING_STATUS = 'Y' AND GD.D_DAY >= 0
